entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 2 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 6 except minus 2 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
